org.lasarobotics.vision.detection

Class ColorBlobDetector

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lasarobotics.vision.detection.ColorBlobDetector

  • public class ColorBlobDetector
extends java.lang.Object
    Implements blob (regional) detection based on color

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ColorBlobDetector(Color color)
      Create a blob detector that searches for a color (within an acceptable radius)
      ColorBlobDetector(Color color, Color colorRadius)
      Create a color blob detector with a target color and a color radius
      ColorBlobDetector(ColorHSV colorMinimum, ColorHSV colorMaximum)
      Create a color blob detector searching for a color between two bounds

      • process

        public void process(org.opencv.core.Mat rgbaImage)
        Process an rgba image. The results can be drawn on retrieved later. This method does not modify the image.
        Parameters:
        rgbaImage - An RGBA image matrix
